DzSlider Class Reference
[Interface Widgets]

Base class for slider/spinner widgets that can display an editable text field. More...

#include <dzslider.h>

Detailed Description

Base class for slider/spinner widgets that can display an editable text field.

Member Function Documentation

QRect DzSlider::calcEditRect (  )  const [protected, virtual]

Subclasses can reimplement this function for custom layout of the text portion of the widget.

Returns:
The area that the text should occupy inside the rect for the widget.
QRect DzSlider::calcLabelRect (  )  const [protected, virtual]

Subclasses can reimplement this function for custom layout of the label portion of the widget.

Returns:
The area that the label should occupy inside the rect for the widget.
QSize DzSlider::calcMinSize (  )  const [protected, virtual]

Subclasses can reimplement this function for custom sizing of the widget.

Returns:
The minimum size of the widget in its current state.
QRect DzSlider::calcSliderRect (  )  const [protected, virtual]

Subclasses can reimplement this function for custom layout of the slider portion of the widget.

Returns:
The area that the slider should occupy inside the rect for the widget.
QRect DzSlider::calcTextRect (  )  const [protected, virtual]

Subclasses can reimplement this function for custom layout of the text portion of the widget.

Returns:
The area that the text should occupy inside the rect for the widget.
DzSlider::editEnd (  )  [signal]

Emitted when an editing operation on the slider ends - e.g. the user releases the slider, or arrow button.

DzSlider::editStart (  )  [signal]

Emitted when an editing operation on the slider begins - e.g. the user starts dragging the slider, or is holding one of the arrow buttons down.

bool DzSlider::isTextEditable (  )  const [virtual, slot]
Returns:
true if the user can edit the text of the slider by right clicking on the slider. This is off by default.
bool DzSlider::isTextVisible (  )  const [virtual, slot]
Returns:
true if the slider text is visible.
